summary:
Having lead a variety of teams in the capacity of Product Manager and Technical Solutions Team Leader, I have a comprehensive picture of what it takes to envision and build user-centric products focused on solving customers' pain points. 

I love to keep track of things in Product Management, Creator economy, and technological advancements in consumer electronics.

What matters most to me:
* Leading a product team to solve real customer problems while working within a dynamic and motivated team
* Gathering customer feedback, understanding their needs, researching the market and competition to establish a product vision that will provide real value to customers and achieve strategic business goals
* Being part of a company culture that promotes employees' health and well-being, and psychological safety


Specialities: Product Management, Leadership, Technical Project Management, Stakeholder Management, International Experience, Public Speaking, Presentations, Training, JavaScript (VueJS, ExpressJS, NodeJS), APIs, Data Analysis, Splunk, Team Building

treasury_media.title: How to effectively create OKRs in your product team
treasury_media.description: Listen to this episode from Product Fika on Spotify. In this episode, Eilon and Nate share their experience in creating OKRs, from not having any in the product team to creating OKRs that feed all the way up to company OKRs. Happy listening!

treasury_media.title: Evo #145 - How to Operate an Effective Work-Life Balance
treasury_media.description: Listen to this episode from The Evolution Exchange Podcast Nordics on Spotify. Evo #145 - How to Operate an Effective Work-Life Balance by The Evolution Exchange Podcast Nordics

treasury_media.title: How to effectively manage stakeholders
treasury_media.description: Listen to this episode from Product Fika on Spotify. In this episode, Eilon and Nate invite Sébastien Bro - engineering manager at Klarna - on the show to discuss various ways to more effectively manage your stakeholders.

treasury_media.title: How to work effectively with your designer
treasury_media.description: Listen to this episode from Product Fika on Spotify. Nate and Eilon have Iain Hazelton, designer at Klarna, join the podcast. In this episode, we discuss the dos and don'ts for product managers when working with your product team's designer.

treasury_media.title: How to work with your engineering manager
treasury_media.description: In this episode, Nate and Eilon discuss some best practices for how product managers can work more effectively with their engineering counterparts. Our guests: Hugo Grochau (engineering manager) and Victor Acosta (product manager).

treasury_media.title: Starting in a new product team
treasury_media.description: Nate and Eilon discuss the best approaches for joining a new product team with 2 new guests.

treasury_media.title: Building Products Under The Magnifying Glass
treasury_media.description: Listen to this episode from The Evolution Exchange Podcast on Spotify. Building Products Under The Magnifying Glass by The Evolution Exchange Podcast

treasury_media.title: 59. Product team structure (w/Eilon & Nathaniel from Klarna)
treasury_media.description: Listen to this episode from Product Coffee on Spotify. The gang brings Eilon & Nathaniel, two PMs from Klarna to discuss product team structure and how it differs from company to company. Follow us on LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/product-coffee...

profile_positions.description: Working on making Klarna's consumer app the world's most convenient place to shop
profile_positions.title: Product Manager, In-app Shopping

profile_positions.description: Product Manager and Accountable Lead for Klarna’s Merchant Lending offering
profile_positions.title: Product Manager,  Merchant Lending

profile_positions.description:
- Designing tailored API based technical solutions for international SaaS platforms, ERP systems, and Payment Service Providers for the integration of Klarna’s Smoooth Payments products. Partners include Mystore.no, Nethit.fi, Datatrans CH, Quickbutik.se, and VisualSoft UK
- Meeting with partners to provide technical workshops, and present an overview and demos of Klarna’s Products
- Project management throughout the integration development phase, while guiding and supporting partners with the technical implementation
- Performing initial quality assurance testing and maintenance after the partners go live
- Providing internal training to new starters in the Solutions Engineering and Delivery management teams
- Co-created first Klarna video tutorials on how to integrate Klarna Checkout & Klarna Payments
profile_positions.title: Partner Solutions Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Leading a team of 3 Technical Solutions Engineers
- Ensuring that their workload is evenly balanced, they receive constructive and prompt feedback and they can continuously learn and grow
- Guiding clients with the technical implementation of our retargeting solutions and optimisation of campaign performance through phone calls, 1:1 meetings, and VC calls
- Maintaining relationship between Sales Leadership and Technical Solutions Engineers through feedback sessions and weekly Leadership meetings
profile_positions.title: Team Leader - Technical Solutions - Tier 1 - Middle East & Africa

profile_positions.description:
- In charge of technical operations for Mid Market Central Europe (DACH, PL), 150 - 200 client integrations per quarter
- Consistently mentoring, developing and coaching my team (5 members) to ensure they are motivated and reaching their KPIs
- Pushing forward process improvements gathered from organisation of brainstorming sessions
- Provided training to new comers of all departments within EMEA Headquarters
profile_positions.title: Team Leader - Mid Market Technical Solutions - Central Europe

profile_positions.description:
- Managing publisher (+/- 15 publisher issues a week) and advertiser integrations (45 to 65 per quarter) for EMEA, ensuring the highest quality set up possible, for optimal campaign performance
- Providing best practice technical solutions to account strategists and publisher business developers to optimise existing campaign performance for both advertisers and publishers
- Adhering to under 1-hour response SLA for clients requesting assistance through Criteo’s support centre tickets
- Contributing to Criteo’s Integrate Platform by creating videos covering the steps in the integration process
- Providing advanced technical solutions and on-boarding training to new Sales Managers and Account Strategists
- Ensuring new starters feel welcome in the Technical Solutions team, support them with training and mentoring where necessary, and provide them with any ad-hoc support they require
profile_positions.title: Technical Solutions Engineer - Mid Market Technical Solutions - EMEA

profile_positions.description:
- Conducting analysis on network performance, network health, and focus on opportunities for growth
- Developed publisher traffic benchmarking tool helping company remove +/- 30% of low-quality traffic
- Collaborating with Technical team on click discrepancy cases, and quality assurance within network
- Created Zendesk reporting structure, providing insights into AdOps workload
- Training new starters in Operations, Analytics and Sales teams
profile_positions.title: Senior Data Analyst - Global

profile_positions.description:
- Conducting in-depth industry analysis to identify and acquire new business opportunities
- Consulting existing clients, ranging from start-ups to well established enterprises, to attain the best utilisation and results from the extensive capabilities of the AWS IaaS platform
- Participated in Amazon Web Services Summit 2014 in London
profile_positions.title: Technical Account Manager - South West UK

profile_positions.description:
- Managing the email marketing process from email scheduling, setup, to quality assurance, deployment and performance analysis for portfolio of 8 EU markets (AT, CZ, CH, ES, FI, IE, NO, PL)
- Project managed creation of dashboards for CRM department, based on requirements gathering
- Managing daily reporting and quarterly forecasting of performance versus target
- Project manager of Direct Mail campaign for the UK
profile_positions.title: Marketing Specialist - EMEA

profile_positions.description:
- Providing insights that empower business developers of the emerging markets to drive further growth of Google AdSense
- Data analysis identifying weak and strong points, business strategies and forecasting the team's quarterly and annual targets
- Weekly reporting and insights on revenue and its corresponding metrics
- Weekly update and maintenance of dashboards
- Requirements gathering and stakeholder negotiation
- Project manager of Revenue Dashboard and Headcount Investment Framework

Main achievements:
- Set up weekly reporting structure for performance in EMEA emerging markets
- Providing weekly insights into performance changes in EMEA emerging markets
- Conducted analyses into underlying issues within EMEA
- Contributed to setting up quarterly business reviews
- Organized brainstorming sessions with the team to discuss actionable initiatives to reach targets
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst - Google AdSense - EMEA

profile_positions.description:
- Developing and maintaining business relationships with community of Dutch publishers, providing on-call and online support, tools and strategies to improve and grow their websites and business through adopting Google AdSense
- Organisation and hosting of roadshow events to meet publishers, present Google AdSense, best practices, and answer strategic questions around the growth of their sites and business
- Manager of scalable communications activity within the AdSense team
- Management of tracking sales process (pitches, implementations, and revenue) for a team of 10 members
- Project Manager of Scalable Email Marketing project aimed at increasing email opt-ins

Main Achievements:
- Consistently overachieved targets (annual target of €160.000)
- Strengthened business relationships with online publishers, through Google AdSense educational events

Additional Events and Projects:
- Presented Google AdSense product at ad:tech 2011 in London 
- DoubleClick for Publishers 2011 conference in London to provide 1 on 1 publisher consultations
- Organised and presented at educational events in London, Dublin, and Amsterdam
- Project manager of localisation of redesigned AdSense account interface in 35 languages
- Lead of the Innovation Committee aimed at fostering and maintaining an innovative culture within the team by organising team innovation projects
profile_positions.title: Online Media Associate - Google AdSense - EMEA
